org.apache.hcatalog.messaging.json
Class JSONMessageFactory

Object
  MessageFactory
      JSONMessageFactory

public class JSONMessageFactory
extends MessageFactory

The JSON implementation of the MessageFactory. Constructs JSON implementations of each message-type.
